snippet.title: Transient Station
snippet.description:
Play in browser here, https://jcupdavis.itch.io/transient-station

Transient Station is an interactive casual puzzle game. You play as a customer service agent in purgatory that is helping people pass on to the next realm. Every character in the game is unique and incomplete and this gives them personality and life. We technologically challenged ourselves by creating a VR system that uses a small projector and an oculus touch controller, this allows us to track the projector in physical space. It’s a flashlight into another reality!
